results.title: Sapphire
results.creator_credit: Basil Relph, Artna and Basil Dearden
results.brief_description: Investigation into the murder of a music student, Sapphire Robbins, leads the detectives along London’s coloured population. Although she passed for white, Sapphire was half Negro, and her dark-skinned brother is one of several suspects. When the detective expose, in all its irrationality, the violent hate that Sapphire managed to arouse, the murderer is driven into a confession. The extract is taken halfway through the film when the police investigation is underway and various people who have known Sapphire Robbins are being questioned. Det Hazard (Nigel Patrick), Det Learoyd (Michael Craig), David Farris (Paul Massie), Mildred Harris (Yvonne Mitchell), Mr Harris (Bernard Miles), Mrs Harris (Olga Lindo), Dr Robbins (Earl Cameron), Paul Slade (Gordon Heath).

results.title: Sappers K9: the dogs of war
results.creator_credit: Vincent Donovan and Australia. Dept. of Defence. Public Relations
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Sentinel”.
Concealed explosives have maimed and killed Australians in military conflict and society because they do not necessarily incorporate metallic components and are undetectable by conventional machines. The use of a special breed of German Shepherd dog by the Royal Australian Engineers promises greater security.

results.title: Santiago's ark
results.brief_description: A New York tenement if Spanish-Harlem is not an easy place to live in. One moves fast and grows up quickly because that’s survival. But one learns to cope with the ghetto and sometimes can transform rubbish into beauty. Santiago’s Ark is such a place of beauty for a boy and his dreams. With endurance and help of the people around him, he sets about building his own ship on the rooftop of his apartment house.

results.title: Santa sangre (D)
results.creator_credit: Claudio Argento, Intersound and Alejandro Jodorowsky
results.brief_description: Like some Fellini-esque nightmare, this mix of circus freaks (tattooed lady, an exotic midget, sad faced clowns), bizarre religious imagery (an armless virgin saint, a cult of holy blood) and hallucinatory imagery (writhing snakes, zombie brides) abounds with disturbing psychological undercurrents. “A strange, violent but ultimately liberating vision.” - Time Out.

results.title: Santa Fe trail. The Cuba story
results.creator_credit: Jack L. Warner and Michael Curtiz
results.brief_description: A saga on the American civil war starring Errol Flynn, Olivia de Havilland and Ronald Reagan. Flynn plays Jeb Stuart, a military man who travels in pursuit of John Brown, leader of a violent anti-slavery campaign. Reagan plays George Custer, romantic rival and West Point classmate of Flynn’s. It is an action packed but ambiguous portrayal of the American civil war and its protagonists who held intensively opposing views. In this collectors edition rehearsal footage is also featured, along with “The Cuba Story”, a documentary on Errol Flynn’s interest and involvement in Cuba and in Fidel Castro.

results.title: Santa Claus: the movie
results.creator_credit: Alexander Salkind Productions, Alexander Salkind, Ilya Salkind and Jeannot Szwarc
results.brief_description: A live action film about Santa Claus, his elves and how one nasty rich man attempts to stop Christmas. The elves leave the Arctic to join Santa’s fight to bring back Christmas to all the children of the world. With Dudley Moore and John Lithgow.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Alexander Salkind Productions, Alexander Salkind, Ilya Salkind and Jeannot Szwarc

results.title: Santa Claus is coming tonight
results.creator_credit: Gaston Sarault, ONF | NFB and Pierre Heberrt
results.brief_description: A combination of live-action footage and animation creates a film that is an effective reminder that Christmas is fast disappearing under a mountain of crass commercialism: Santa Clauses that operate on a tight time schedule, a landscape shorn of evergreens, a cornucopia of toys and gadgets, and a cacophony of noise. The story is biting, the drawings are pointed, and the feast of Christmas stands divested of its slick trappings.

results.title: Santa class test
results.creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Peter Long
results.brief_description: Don’t be deceived by the talk of goodwill behind the scenes in the world of Santa Claus training, the reality is different. We are witnessing the passing of the old Santas. Now they do it for the money. ‘If we’re not professionals we’re nothing’ muses the narrator-Santa in training. But the day of reckoning comes for every Santa who has to face the acid test: the client. Adapted from the short story by Peter Murphy from his anthology ‘The Moving Shadow Problem’. Cast includes Matthew Green and Esme Melville.
